price: 82. Soki baboyi bapesi mikongo, ya soló penza, yo ozali na eloko mosusu te sé okomisa sango ya polele.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-innamā ʿalayka al-balāghu al-mubīnu
